remarks: The projective map of a Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
statement:
pmapfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pmapfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmapfval.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapfval $p |- ( K e. C -> M = ( x e. B |-> { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) ) $.
$d A a $.
$d B x $.
$d K a x $.
